import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import "./Header.css" import { FiSearch} from "react-icons/fi" import {ImLocation2} from "react-icons/im" import {AiOutlineClose} from "react-icons/ai" function TransDesign() { let[t,setT]=useState(Window.innerWidth) const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(true) const [isPrimaryMenuDisplay, setIsPrimaryMenu] = useState(false) const [navHeight,setNavHeight] = useState(false) const [responsiveSidebar,setResponsiveSidebar] = useState(true) const [topNav,setTopNav] = useState(false) const sideBar=()=>{ if(responsiveSidebar==true){ setResponsiveSidebar(false) setNavHeight(true) } else{ setResponsiveSidebar(true) setNavHeight(false) } } const handleResize = () => { if (t < 1100) { setIsMobile(false) setIsPrimaryMenu(true) } else { setIsMobile(true) setIsPrimaryMenu(false) // setResponsiveSidebar(false) } } const top_nav_width=()=>{ if (t < 820) { setTopNav(true) } else { setTopNav(false) } } // create an event listener useEffect(() => { setT(Window.innerWidth) window.addEventListener("resize", handleResize) window.addEventListener("resize", top_nav_width) }) return ( <>
